title: Sri Lanka to study multi-modal logistics hub with ADB help
byline: The feasibility study will be funded by ADB.

title: US stocks plunge as Trump nationalism blamed, oil slumps
byline: The Fed has been operating a regime called Flexible Average Inflation Targeting (FAIT) delaying return to prudent policy

title: Sri Lanka central bank buys US$70mn in Feb 2025
byline: The January the central bank bought 47.3 million US dollars and sold 35 million dollars.
